title: Ubuntu vs Debian

itemA.name: Ubuntu
pros: Better hardware support out of the box
itemA.bestFor: Beginners, desktop users, and those who want things to work out of the box

itemB.name: Debian
cons: Hardware support may require extra work
itemB.bestFor: Servers, experienced users, and those who prioritize stability over new features

verdict: Choose Ubuntu if you're new to Linux or want a polished desktop experience. Choose Debian if you prioritize stability, run servers, or prefer a minimal system you build up yourself.
